sustainabilityAttributes.title: Upcycled
sustainabilityAttributes.description: We repurpose our clothes using over 90% used clothes and textiles

sustainabilityAttributes.title: Better Factory
sustainabilityAttributes.description: In addition to meeting baseline standards for social accountability, wages, benefits, and health and safety, this factory goes above and beyond to prioritize environmental management systems and reduce its impact on the planet.

fabric.care: Machine Wash Cold. Tumble Dry Low.

details.description: Our men's upcycled skinny jeans are a stylish and sustainable option for any fashion-conscious individual. These jeans are made from repurposed denim, giving new life to pre-used materials and reducing textile waste. The denim is carefully selected and reconstructed to create a slim fit and tapered leg, giving them a modern and trendy look. The upcycling process also allows us to offer unique one-of-a-kind designs and wash variations, making each pair truly unique. These jeans are not only good for the environment, but also for the fashion industry. The upcycling process saves resources, reduces waste, and avoids pollution. Plus, it also supports a circular economy. These jeans are perfect for anyone looking to make a fashion statement while also making a positive impact on the planet.
